Darkfate/Perceptor/Sharpclaws/Charon/Underground/Deepfear/Chamaleon/
Attila/Luzbel/Kali/Thyphon::


"I'll be there in a nano" replied Darkfate and he said to Thyphon " 
Thyphon, leave the bot..."

"Hey boss, ya're kidding, aren't you?"replied the seasnake, who 
continued bitting Bullet's neck.

"Thyphon leave that bot and and leave this area, if you don't like 
stay in Blackfortress three months without leave it and without take 
part in a fight..." replied Darkfate, who hadn't mood to stand a 
troublemaker.

The sea snake free Bullet and with his tail, struck Bullet's 
body. "How good luck has the bull" commented Aelo.

"He will have a big good luck if he survive my cyber poison" replied 
Thyphon before he left the room.

Seconds later Perceptor, Perceptor's team and the others arrived, 
Darkfate spoke "Perceptor take this troublemaker bull and left him in 
cr's, reparation level 4; keep an eye, I don't like that he make me 
troubles again... I like make him some questions... Attilla, take 
Chameleon and leave him in cr, as soon as he leaves it I like that he 
reports in medical bay to check his circuits and later I like to 
speak with him too... Luzbel, call the clean-drones and fix this 
place... If someone knows what had happened here I like to know it 
after I speak with Destrons... Perceptor you have other duty: I like 
that you and Blacknightmare find out the number of new bots that 
exist in BlackFortress... I like that Orchestra helps you..." 

Darkfate left the place anc join to Drillbit in Conference Room. 
Perceptor walked some steps and said to others bots "MOVE NOW!!!"

Deepfear, Charon, Underground and Sharpcraws took Bullet and carried 
him to cr,  Attila did the same. Perceptor left the room.

"They always have the fun and I always have to clean the mess" 
protested Luzbel while clean-drones started to arrive
